title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When exporting a Zip file in a workspace with multiple projects, the checkboxes are not updated with a busy cursor during the process.
EB: The checkboxes should be updated with a busy cursor during the export process to indicate that the system is busy.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Open a workspace with many projects.  
2. Export a Zip file.  
3. Select all the projects.  
4. Choose some file types to include.  
5. Press the 'OK' button.
